The patient is anticipated to be discharged home within 2 to 3 days, possibly requiring sub-acute rehab (SAR) following an inpatient stay. 

Physical therapy plan:
- Stair negotiation
- Gait training
- ADL training
- Balance training
- Discharge to SAR or home with family assistance and a walker, for approximately 5 to 7 days.
